mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes sections entitled "On the Record", "The Square of the Month", "Musicians' Corner", "The Idea Corral", "Square Dance Handies", and "Southern California Square Dance Directory". Also included in this edition is an article entitled "The Square Dance Bug is Biting" and an article on how a publicity program can help your Square Dance Club. Other articles also include lyrics for dances and explanations on the dances and an article on why people are square dancing. Dedication: "This first regular issue of 'Sets In Order' is dedicated to Tommy Collins, 15-year-old Cheyenne Mountain Dancer, who lost his life in a treacherous sea while enroute to the Southern California Institute."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
